page.title: 02Facilities for old people
page.content: We went to see a retired couple to interview them. This is what they said. There are quite alot of services for old people,things like "meals on wheels" home nursing or "home help". If you want a bus pass you would pay one pound and when you show it to the bus driver you only pay half price.If you couldn't do your decorating the Local Authority would do it for you. It would be one room a year. To go to the cinema for old people it would be half price in the afternoon. A hobby of old people is going to Bingo and it is cheaper. At{Prettygate library}old people have a special sevice. A yellow van goes to their house .The library have a list of people who can't get out of their houses .The van goes every 1 or 2 weeks . They also have special books
